entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
